conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: <enthusiastic>Welcome to Tech Talk Today! I'm Alice, with my co-host Bob. Today's topic: AI trends!</enthusiastic>

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: <curious>AI's making waves everywhere. Your thoughts, Alice?</curious>

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: <confident>It's revolutionary, Bob. Chatbots, analytics - AI's changing everything.</confident>

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: <excited>Exactly! Healthcare too - better diagnoses, surgical assistance.</excited>

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: <thoughtful>Good point. Privacy issues, bias, job displacement - all concerns.</thoughtful>

conversation.speaker: Alice
conversation.text: <optimistic>We're just starting, Bob. Expect the unimaginable soon!</optimistic>

conversation.speaker: Bob
conversation.text: <upbeat>Exciting times ahead! Thanks, listeners. Join us next week!</upbeat>
